_sText: --------------------------------------------- Surf_thrill3r_final (thriller 3) by Buck Nasty Ramps by Paper-cut --------------------------------------------- Please update your server with surf_thrill3r_final ! Found a minor bug that has been fixed. Yes, thriller 3! Completely rebuilt from the bottom to top (from scratch) this map has all new structures, smooth ramps, and a new jail. I would have not made this map unless if it weren't for Paper-cut. So, you can either blame him or thank him for this clean 3rd version. If you're wondering "Why the name thrill3r?" Well...Someone had already posted their own version of my thriller and had named it "surf_thriller3." So, I was kinda left with no choice but to name it surf_thrill3r, with a 3. This map contains... - Guns: m3, p90, ak47, m4a1, m429, awp, and nades (but they aren't guns). - A buyzone in the secret room at the end. - An internal jail release system (transferred over from the older versions). - A room with one way glass in jail for those who know the secret code. This map will be on the cycle at my server @ css.nyfiber.net:30000 Join my Steam Group @ http://steamcommunity.com/groups/bucknastysurf for map betas and other stuff. - I endorse this 3rd version and only this 3rd version. -- Buck Nasty http://waspnest.net/ http://solidsurf.info/
